narratives.question_text: Looking back on this course, what is your overall assessment of the course:  What are its strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might it be improved?
comments: Good
It was a good course and Dr. Makuch was great!!

Interesting perspective on drug regulation from an insider. Pretty dull material however. Homeworks were fairly good exercises however some of the material, both in lecture and as homework was redundant. It's nice that exams are open book and note, but some of the exam questions, particularly on the final were ridiculous! True, false, or it depends??? True and false are absolutes, when is everything ever absolute? An answer can be practically always true, practically always false, but in actuality is 'it depends' ever wrong either and yet it's on option? Silly line of exam questions. Claude Petit was a phenomenal guest lecturer! Presenting the material is a clear and even engaging manner.
This is a good introductory course with enriched materials. The class is easy....
the class is helpful in understanding regulatory affairs
Great course. The professor was passionate about the information and delivered it in an engaging manner. It was a joy.
It's an easy class, easy HP, easy H for those who pay attention in the class
good

narratives.question_text: Please evaluate the instructor of this course. What are the instructor's strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might his or her teaching be improved?
comments: Instructor: Robert Makuch  good
Instructor: Robert Makuch  He is great and very knowledge in the field. He is willing to working to us outside of class and help us connect with professionals in the field.
Instructor: Robert Makuch  knowledgeable teacher

Instructor: Robert Makuch  Seemed like he wasn't particularly prepared for the class at times. Couldn't figure out how to technically operate his powerpoints, some of which were half in Chinese and weren't modified to reflect material he wanted to present to the class as the audience. Cancelled class due to snow at seemingly the last possible minute. Also has distracting throat clearing tendencies.
Instructor: Robert Makuch  Very knowledgeable, but sometimes won't reply emails
Instructor: Robert Makuch  he is excellent, responsible and helpful
Instructor: Robert Makuch  Great professor.
Instructor: Robert Makuch  It's Prof. Makuch's class, he's a nice guy.
Instructor: Robert Makuch  Professor is willing to share his experience in this field.

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize this course for a fellow student? Would you recommend it to another student? Why or why not?
comments: good
If a student is interested in regulatory affairs, I would definitely recommend the course because you learn the basics and make more connections through Dr. Makuch.
Good introduction work for students with interest in regulatory affairs.
Good course to learn FDA affairs and drug development
I would recommend it to a student who was interested in a career in regulatory affairs and drug development, but probably not a wider audience.
Easy intro course
recommended
Easy class, low workload, regulatory affairs. Highly recommend for those who have a career plan in pharmaceuticals.
The course is essential for students who want to go into regulatory affairs career.
Recommended.
